item.description: This is a monthly networking for those in the Biotech industry. Strictly networking and no lectures to sit through. Average monthly turnout is typically 100-200 people. Venues are held at different locations each month throughout the Greater Boston area. For more details, check out www.biotechtuesday.com or feel free to reach out to either organizers on more details. You MUST REGISTER throuh www.biotechtuesday.com to be on the guest list otherwise it is $20 at the door. RSVPING through this group will allow your name on the list.
item.name: Biotech Tuesday
